name: Tonari no 801-chan - Fujoshiteki Koukou Seikatsu
nutshell: Junior-high school student Rei Hoshino, a fujoshi who does not especially have any interest in the 3D aspect of life, suddenly changes when on a rainy day she takes interest in a high school student named Kei Akai and wants to get into the same high school as him. To that end, she enlists the help of her childhood friend Shōtarō Kamiyu who helps her study for the entrance examination, and diet so as to become a cuter girl. All goes according to plan, until a scheming girl going to the same school named Luna Kurotsuki makes it harder for Rei to get closer to Kei

name: Shitai no ♡ Karen-san!!
tags: Ghosts,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Office Workers,Harem,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell: The romantic comedy manga centers on Kōta Nakamichi, who ever since he was a kid he has had female spirits obsessed with him. Kōta is searching for a job and he has a final interview, but the scantily-clad spirits surrounding him make the interview a total failure. However, his interviewer, the company president Karen Suguri, has a secret of her own.

name: Second Life
nutshell: National idol Gu Ming is a cute and docile little sheep in front of others and a two-faced and quiet little demon behind their backs. The ordinary female lead unexpectedly swapped bodies with him and actually decided to "live the carefree life of a boy!" What should he do in order to return to his own body and life?

name: 69 Street, Tomorrow Island
nutshell:
The young Cheolwoo from Korea goes on a trip to the beautiful vacation spot, Tomorrow Island, only to lose his important belongings not long after he arrives. As an omega, Cheolwoo needs his inhibitors so he immediately starts a part-time job… Then his fateful meeting with Dylan happens, and he gets to experience what it’s like to be in the middle of a whirlwind of pheromones.
(Random Fujoshis Scans)

name: The Return Of Emperor Ye Xuan
nutshell: The powers Lin, Bing Dou, Zhe, Jie, Zhen, Lie, Qian and Xing make up the Nine Arts Mantra, bearing nine different indomitable powers. Upon nearing his demise, Ye Xuan used the powers of the Nine Arts Mantra to resurrect himself, thus draining the powers of the Mantra. To find back the strength for revenge, Ye Xuan was led on the path of restoring the Nine Arts Mantra.

name: Sasen mo Warukunai
nutshell: Ulises, a brilliant but inflexible soldier, is shunned by the top brass and demoted to a station in a rural area where he meets his new wife Lea. The demotion that should've been a terrible thing turns into a blessing as Lea and her siblings teach the boorish Ulises about family and love. A soothing daily life fantasy about a silent military man and a clumsy new wife.

name: Shi ni Itaru Yamai
nutshell: This is the mysterious story of Futaba Kazuma's first patient. At 18, Futaba Kazuma went to school to get his qualification in clinical psychology. While attending school, he boards at a creepy mansion, which even has a butler. Also living there is a strange young woman called Emiru. She is suffering from a terminal illness of the heart — despair. This deep psychological problem has eerie physical effects as well: her hair has turned white, her body temperature is well below normal, and her blood pressure is also bizarre. No psychologists or counselors have been able to help cure her of this problem. Will Kazuma be able to determine the cause of Emiru's despair and save her before it's too late?

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure & Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica - Jojoka☆Magica (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Jojo parody of Madoka Magica.

name: Konami-chan Panic!
nutshell: Student/hacker Konami purchases a cordless phone from a door-to-door salesman and finds that it possesses the power to transcend space and time. Gag comedy ensues.

name: Lupin III Superstar
nutshell: Lupin III Superstar is a one-shot chapter of Lupin III. This chapter was included in Lupin III Collection of Unpublished Works.

name: Touhou - Growth Status (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Alice makes a bra for Marisa.

name: Jigokugata Ningen Doubutsuen - Dainishou - Isshokusokuhatsu Zen Girl
nutshell: The story of the girl that follows the “Spinal Fluid” arc is revealed! Will she be able to reach enlightenment?

name: 320F4
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Boys' Love,School Life,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: At well-known University 985, there's 320 dorm. Because the four people in the dormitory have different personalities but all look very handsome, they are known as 320F4. Here is their little story.

name: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica - Cherish (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Kyouko & Sayaka doujinshi from Comiket 81.

name: Princess Next Door
nutshell:
A Story of a girl meeting a princess. Smol Lisa and smol Yukina.
Links:

Author's Pixiv
Author's Twitter

name: Himitsu no Kuchizuke
nutshell:
A collection of short stories.


Himitsu no Kuchizuke (Secret Kiss)
Okumura thinks his lover Nagao is hiding something from him. What could it be?


Sunrise Sexpress
A man decides to ask his friend for some help in regards of a crush, but nothing ever goes to plan.


One Night Heaven
A smutty oneshot about a couple who go to an onsen (hot spring resort) to rekindle their relationship. Little did they know what was awaiting them when they got there.

name: Fumetsu
nutshell: Kirie is a vampire's orphant raised by ex solider. When she was 12, he was killed by vampire. As a teen Kirie joined the army of god. She became his hand after years of service. That "god" is seen as benefactor and he is standing behind " heaven" and " hell".

name: Father Complex
nutshell: 23 year old Shiori and Sumire really love old men so they use a father rental service.

name: Twin Flowers of the Cold Distant Sea
nutshell: The little princess Lian Tan, who was regarded as the “star of destruction” by the beast tribe was unhappy with her elder twin sister, holy maiden, Yao Fang's marriage. Hence, she designed a plan to make the crown prince Shao Yu call off the marriage through her talent of causing trouble. However, while doing so, she landed herself in grave danger. Meanwhile, the holy maiden, Yao Fang, accidentally ended up in the demon tribe and became the concubine of the demon tribe’s second prince. The twin flowers’ misplaced marriage led to the uncovering of an astounding secret that had been covered up for a thousand of years in the three realms and eight lands.

name: You're Mine
nutshell: A rich young master and an abandoned son in an orphanage. Two people with different identities and positions, yet became good brothers for ten years.

name: Koukyuu no Zatsuyouki
nutshell: Shaolan, a girl who was born and raised in the mountains, is scouted to become a court lady at the inner palace. On her first day at court, however, she knocks down the first queen with a slap! Because of this, she is demoted from court lady to servant, but she uses her wisdom and abilities, cultivated through her mountain upbringing, to solve the problems of the palace. Eventually, her achievements reach the ears of the emperor.

name: UPSHOT (H)
nutshell: Aimi was frustrated, her family that was once so warm had become cold and distant. One day, her frustrations reached a boiling point.

name: Black Clover Gaiden: Quartet Knights
nutshell:
Its black clover spin off form shonen jump + the story based on the black clover ps4 and pc game quartet knights by Yumiya Tashiro of Night King and Dragon's Dogma Revives fame!
Yami Sukehiro, the captain of Asta's knight order, the Black Bulls, suddenly grows younger, just as a mysterious mage launches an attack on the Clover Kingdom. Join Asta and his friends as they embark on a new adventure of trials and tribulations.

name: A Hero Whose Body Undergoes an Unusual Change
3 Partner Hajimemashita!!
nutshell: The manga is about a love between three people, in particular a woman who marries two men.

name: Otaku Onna to Danshi Kosei
nutshell: A story about a nerdy senpai at work who is addicted to an otome game and her kouhai, a high school boy who is similar to the character of the otome game.

name: Hananoi-kun to Koi no Yamai
nutshell:
Hananoi is the most coveted boy at his class. Handsome, intelligent and mysteriously aloof, no girl is beyond his reach. In a fated winter day, his classmate Hinase Hotaru witnesses him callously breaking up with his girlfriend, who storms out of the café they're in after throwing her drink on his face. Later in the day, Hotaru finds him at a park bench with an empty stare, idling under the snow. Concerned, she offers him cover under her umbrella.
The next day, Hananoi asks her to be his girlfriend… and she says no. However, Hananoi doesn't give up.
Why did this mere act of kindness reach someone like Hananoi?
Why does it have to be Hotaru?
Does she have what it takes for him to lift up the barriers he has for everyone?

name: Chat
nutshell:
Our protagonist Kang Hae Yo is not an ordinary high school girl by any measure. She is in fact a jjang of her school and her gang is the most powerful in Seoul. But she wants a normal life and a normal boyfriend. Her hot-bloodedness always get in her way. And her quick-temper when she encounters "wimps", by her standards, make her desire all the more unreachable.
This is the year 2002. Every youngster gets to chat online once in a while. And Kang Hae Yo is no exception as she goes on the web under the nickname "playgirl18". She doesn't really know her way around the computer But her sub-jjang, Yoon Ji Ni, teaches her the "necessary things for online chatting" – like how to be girly. Hae Yo begins to find for herself a new life from online chatting. She begins to think of online chatting as her only way out from gang life. What will happen?
